title: Tom Brady, Part 1:  How to Reach Peak Performance
description: In a rare interview, the superstar of the New England Patriots, Tom Brady, often called “the greatest quarterback of all-time,” reveals what he believes is the key to his longevity and success. Forty-year-old Brady discusses his #1 New York Times bestselling book “The TB 12 Method” and shares his insights into the spiritual side of football. Tom says, "Spirituality is my deepest purpose.  I want to know the whys of life and I want to know why we're here and where we're going."
author: podcasts@own.oprah.com (Oprah)
